author: Alan H
comment: I tried this because it has an app for the phone and a smart watch. I can't get any delivery information on either.

author: Alexey Akimov
comment: Looks like good app, but doesn't work with SF Express, so can't track my order from Aliexpress.

reply.author: Qian He
reply.content: Hi Alexey. I'd like to support more package delivery services. Currently, Delivery is using Boxoh API (http://www.boxoh.com), which supports USPS, UPS, FedEx, and DHL/AirBorne. I haven't found any free APIs that support more delivery services. Please let me know if you find any. Thanks!

title: Needs more delivery services
